subject: Best rates on medication, shipping worldwide
body:
Dear customer.
CanadianPharmacy is one of very few online stores that sell generic medications only. Don't waste too much on what can cost less.
A pass into your new healthy life can cost less than you think. Try CanadianPharmacy #1 licensed Canadian Web pharmacy. Purchase your medications from CanadianPharmacy and save large with our weekly specials and discount offers. Our prices and quality are the best on the Web.
CanadianPharmacy your #1 source for cheap generic drugs from Canada.
Sincerely yours,Isabel Wilkins
